links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
example: With increasing n, a(n) goes to infinity.
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b061555.txt", n, " ", sigma(n!)\n!) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 24 2009]
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 17 2001
extensions: Terms corrected for an offset of 0 by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 24 2009
